Class mpt_InferenceForwardBackward

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.mpt_InferenceForwardBackward
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward, mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep, mpt_InferenceBackwardStep

    public class mpt_InferenceForwardBackward
extends java.lang.Object
implements mpt_i_InferenceForwardBackward
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): page 576.

     function FORWARD-BACKWARD(ev, prior) returns a vector of probability distributions
   inputs: ev, a vector of evidence values for steps 1,...,t
           prior, the prior distribution on the initial state, P(X0)
   local variables: fv, a vector of forward messages for steps 0,...,t
                    b, a representation of the backward message, initially all 1s
                    sv, a vector of smoothed estimates for steps 1,...,t
                    
   fv[0] <- prior
   for i = 1 to t do
       fv[i] <- FORWARD(fv[i-1], ev[i])
   for i = t downto 1 do
       sv[i] <- NORMALIZE(fv[i] * b)
       b <- BACKWARD(b, ev[i])
   return sv
    Figure 15.4 The forward-backward algorithm for smoothing: computing posterior probabilities of a sequence of states given a sequence of observations. The FORWARD and BACKWARD operators are defined by Equations (15.5) and (15.9), respectively.

    Note: An implementation of the FORWARD-BACKWARD algorithm using the general purpose probability APIs, i.e. the underlying model implementation is abstracted away.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

      • forward

        public mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator forward(mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator f1_t,
                                           java.util.List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment> e_tp1)
        Description copied from interface: mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep
        The FORWARD operator is defined by Equation (15.5).
         P(Xt+1 | e1:t+1) 
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt, e1:t)P(xt | e1:t)
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt)P(xt | e1:t) (Markov Assumption)
        Specified by:
        forward in interface mpt_i_InferenceForwardStep
        Parameters:
        f1_t - f1:t
        e_tp1 - et+1
        Returns:
        f1:t+1

      • backward

        public mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator backward(mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator b_kp2t,
                                            java.util.List<mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment> e_kp1)
        Description copied from interface: mpt_InferenceBackwardStep
        The BACKWARD operator
         bk+1:t = P(ek+1:t | Xk)
        is defined by Equation (15.9).
         P(ek+1:t | Xk) 
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | Xk, xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (conditioning on Xk+1)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk) (by conditional independence)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1, ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
 = ∑xk+1P(ek+1 | xk+1)P(ek+2:t | xk+1)P(xk+1 | Xk)
        Specified by:
        backward in interface mpt_InferenceBackwardStep
        Parameters:
        b_kp2t - bk+2:t
        e_kp1 - ek+1:t
        Returns:
        bk+1:t
